sentences.sContent: Chinese civilization is the only one without interruption.
sentences.sContent_eng: Chinese civilization is the only one without interruption.
sentences.sCn: 中华文明是唯一没有中断的文明。

sentences.sContent: Chinese civilization is the only one without interruption in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Chinese civilization is the only one without interruption in the world.
sentences.sCn: 中华文明是人类历史上唯一没有中断的文明。

sentences.sContent: So, any interruption to one of the access path does not affect storage access from the host.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, any interruption to one of the access path does not affect storage access from the host.
sentences.sCn: 因此，其中一条访问路径的中断不会影响从主机发起的存储访问。

phrases.pCn: 供电中断，电源中断；从电中断

words.tran: 中断的；被打断的；不规则的
